actions.subcommittee: Postsecondary Education, Training and Life-Long Learning
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Postsecondary Education, Training and Life-Long Learning.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Postsecondary Education, Training and Life-Long Learning

official_title: Expressing the sense of the Congress that all parents should be afforded the opportunity to plan ahead for their children's college education through tuition prepayment plans that guarantee college for their offspring at a fixed price.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that all States should adopt a tuition prepayment plan to allow families the opportunity to save for their children's college education in advance and at a guaranteed rate.

titles.title: Expressing the sense of the Congress that all parents should be afforded the opportunity to plan ahead for their children's college education through tuition prepayment plans that guarantee college for their offspring at a fixed price.
